text: The Bight of Benin is a bight on the western African coast. The bight is part of the Gulf of Guinea. The Republic of Benin and this bight were both named after the Benin Empire. This area is known as the Slave Coast. This area was used heavily in the African slave trade. Category:Geography of Africa Category:Bodies of water of Africa Category:Bays
title: Bight of Benin
